name: Kreosotum
Relationship: GUAIACOL (is the principal constituent of Kreosote, and similar in action. Used in pulmonary tuberculosis. Dose 1 to 5M.Antidote: NUX. Inimical: CARBO.Compare also: FULIGO LIGNI; CARBOL-AC.; IOD.; LACHES.MATICO - Artanthe or Piper augustifolia, (Gonorrhea, hemorrhage from lungs; catarrhal condition of genitourinary organs and gastrointestinal tract. Topically a hemostatic. Difficult, dry, deep, winter cough. Use tincture.)Complementary in malignant diseases: ARS.; PHOS.; SULPH.

Head: Occipital pain
Menstrual headache
Dull pain, as from a board pressing against forehead
Stomach: Bitter taste after a swallow of water
Nausea; vomiting of food several hours after eating; of sweetish water in the morning
Feeling of coldness, as of ice water in stomach
Abdomen: Cholera infantum in connection with painful dentition, green stools, nausea, dry skin, exhaustion, etc.
Mouth: Very rapid decay of teeth, with spongy, bleeding gums; teeth dark and crumbly
Very painful dentition; child will not sleep
Respiratory: After every cough, copious, purulent expectoration
Raw burning in chest; pains and oppression
Cough; worse evening, with efforts to vomit, with pain in chest
Winter coughs of old people, with heavy pressure on sternum
Face: Sick, suffering expression; hot, cheeks red
Urine: Violent itching of vulva and vagina, worse when urinating
Enuresis in the first part of night
Must hurry when desire comes to urinate
Can urinate only when lying; cannot get out of bed quick enough during first sleep
Back: Dragging backache, extending to genitals and down thighs
Sleep: Paralytic sensation in limbs on waking
Anxious dreams of pursuit, fire, erections, etc.
Female: Burning and soreness in external and internal parts
Menstrual flow intermits ; ceases on sitting or walking; reappears on lying down
Leucorrhoea, yellow, acrid; odor of green corn; worse between periods
Corrosive itching within vulva, burning and swelling of labia; violent itching between labia and thighs
During menses, difficult hearing; buzzing and roaring; eruption after
Skin: Ecchymosis; dorsal surface of fingers and hands eczematous
Extremities: Pain in joints, hip and knee

details: Mental.Music causes weeping and palpitation. Vanishing of thought; stupid, forgetful, peevish, irritable. Child wants everything but throws it away when given.Pulsations all over the body, and profuse bleeding from small wounds. Very severe, old neuralgic affections; pains rather aggravated by rest. EXCORIATING, burning, and offensive discharges. Hemorrhages, ulcerations, cancerous affections. Rapid decomposition of fluids and secretions, and burning pains. Overgrown, poorly developed children. Post-climacteric diseases. Tumefaction, puffiness, gangrene. Ailings of teething children.Kreosotum is a mixture of phenol obtained from this distillation.
dosage: Third to thirtieth potency. The 200th in sensitive patients.
